title: Simulation-Based Electronics Laboratory Education: Blended Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Experimental training course for current professionals combining hybrid learning environments that integrate physical lab accessibility with efficient simulation tool utilization

learning_goals: Perform circuit design and verification of at least three types using an electronic circuit simulation tool.

Learners design blended learning strategies linking physical and virtual labs (e.g., PhET simulations) during a one-week intensive course, apply them to three or more experimental scenarios, and achieve over 80% satisfaction in peer evaluations and instructor feedback
Improve experimental result analysis and problem-solving skills through formative assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
